alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued September 20 at 1:34PM MDT until September 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Snowfall amounts increasing with elevation from around 2 inches at 6000 feet to upwards of 10 inches on the summits. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region and Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cooler temperatures, rain, and wind can result in raw conditions and the potential for hypothermia for those with outdoor and backcountry recreational interests.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
